results.title: Comparison of Effects of Metformin, Phenformin, and Inhibitors of Mitochondrial Complex I on Mitochondrial Permeability Transition and Ischemic Brain Injury
results.text_hl: Preincubation of slices with 0.5 mM @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had no statistically significant effect and the level of LDH release remained similar as in the simulated @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ group (316 +- 134%) (Figure 3).
